item.title: FFmpeg tips
item.description: A complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and stream audio and video. https://ffmpeg.org/ Concatenating files ffmpeg -f concat -i list.txt -c copy output.mp4 list.txt cat list.txt --- /tmp/file1.mp4 /tmp/file2.
